newsitem.title: JAPAN: Fujitsu shares advance to new 1997 high.
newsitem.headline: Fujitsu shares advance to new 1997 high.

text.p: Shares in Fujitsu Ltd advanced to a new high for 1997 in heavy trade on Tuesday morning.
The shares have recently attracted investors as one of the leading issues in the high-technology and communications equipment sectors, as well as dealers aiming for quick profits, traders said.
At 0058 GMT, Fujitsu shares stood 20 yen higher at 1,470, a new high for 1997. Turnover was 3.977 million shares, making it the most actively traded issue on the Tokyo bourse.

"The share price matched its previous high for this (calendar) year at yesterday's close, and the strength encouraged investors as well as dealers aiming to take short-term profits to chase the shares," said a broker at a medium-sized securities house.
